00006 static pthread_key_t tls_key;
00007 #else
00008 __thread CTHREAD *tls_thread;
00009 #endif

00011 static uint32_t next_tid;
00012 
00013 CRETURN_POINT *CRETURN_POINT_init()
00014 {
00015   CRETURN_POINT *ret;
00016 
00017   ret = (CRETURN_POINT *) malloc( sizeof(CRETURN_POINT) );
00018   if (!ret) {
00019     return 0;
00020   }
00021 
00022   // get context returns in two cases 1 when called, when setcontext passes control back.
00023   getcontext( &ret->context);
00024   
00025   return 0;
00026 }

00029 int CTHREAD_libinit()
00030 {
00031 #ifdef NO_TLS
00032   pthread_key_create( &tls_key, 0);
00033 #endif
00034   return 0;
00035 }

00037 void cthread_init( CTHREAD *arg )
00038 {
00039   arg->proc( arg->ctx );
00040   
00041   arg->state = CTHREAD_STATE_EXIT; 
00042 
00043   STACKS_release( arg->stack_entry );
00044 
00045 #if 0
00046   setcontext( &arg->context_caller );
00047 #endif
00048 }
00049 
00050 typedef void (*MK_CTX_FUNC) (void);
00051 
00052 CTHREAD * CTHREAD_init( STACKS *stacks, CTHREAD_PROC proc, void *ctx )
00053 {
00054   void *stack;
00055   CTHREAD *ret;
00056 
00057   ret = (CTHREAD *) malloc( sizeof(CTHREAD) );
00058   if (!ret) {
00059     return 0;
00060   }
00061 
00062   stack = STACKS_get( stacks, &ret->stack_entry );
00063   if (!stack) {
00064     return 0;
00065   }
00066 
00067   ret->proc = proc;
00068   ret->ctx = ctx;
00069   ret->rvalue = 0;
00070   ret->prev_thread = 0;
00071 
00072   ret->thread_id = -1;   
00073   ret->state = CTHREAD_STATE_INIT;
00074 
00075 
00076   if (getcontext( &ret->context_coroutine )) {
00077     if (ret->state == CTHREAD_STATE_INIT) {
00078       STACKS_release(ret->stack_entry);
00079       free(ret);
00080     }  
00081     return 0;
00082   }
00083 
00084   ret->context_coroutine.uc_stack.ss_sp = ret;
00085   ret->context_coroutine.uc_stack.ss_size = STACKS_get_stack_size( stacks );
00086 
00087 
00088   return ret;
00089 }

00093 static int do_start( CTHREAD *thread )
00094 {
00095   thread->state = CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING;
00096   
00097   thread->thread_id = ++next_tid;
00098 
00099 #ifdef NO_TLS
00100   thread->prev_thread = pthread_getspecific( tls_key );
00101   pthread_setspecific( tls_key, thread );
00102 #else
00103   thread->prev_thread = tls_thread;
00104   tls_thread = thread;
00105 #endif
00106 
00107 #if 0
00108   thread->context_coroutine.uc_link = 0;
00109 #else 
00110   thread->context_coroutine.uc_link = &thread->context_caller;
00111 #endif
00112   makecontext( & thread->context_coroutine, (MK_CTX_FUNC) cthread_init, 1, thread);
00113   
00114   setcontext( &thread->context_coroutine );
00115   
00116   // should not get here.
00117   return -1;
00118 }
00119 
00120 
00121 int CTHREAD_start( CTHREAD *thread )
00122 {
00123   if (thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_INIT) {
00124     return -1;
00125   }
00126   getcontext( &thread->context_caller );
00127   if (thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING) {
00128     // got here when the running thread called yield for the first time, or exited without calling yield.
00129     thread->state = CTHREAD_STATE_SUSPENDED;
00130     return 0;
00131   }
00132   if (thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_EXIT) {
00133     // got here from thread that has exited.
00134     return 0;
00135   }
00136   return do_start( thread );
00137 }
00138 
00139 int CTHREAD_start_ex( CTHREAD *thread, CRETURN_POINT *next )
00140 {
00141   if (thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_INIT) {
00142     return -1;
00143   }
00144   thread->context_caller = next->context;
00145   return do_start( thread );
00146 }
00147 
00148 int CTHREAD_join( CTHREAD *thread )
00149 {  
00150    if( thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_INIT ||
00151        thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING) {
00152      return -1;
00153    }
00154    while(thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_EXIT) {
00155      CTHREAD_resume( thread );
00156    }
00157    return 0;
00158 }
00159 
00160 
00161 int CTHREAD_resume( CTHREAD *thread)
00162 {
00163   if (thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_SUSPENDED) {
00164     return -1;
00165   }
00166 
00167   getcontext( &thread->context_caller );
00168   if (thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING) {
00169     // got here when the running thread called yield for the first time, or exited without calling yield.
00170     thread->state = CTHREAD_STATE_SUSPENDED;
00171     return 0;
00172   }
00173   if (thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_EXIT) {
00174     // got here from thread that has exited.
00175     return 0;
00176   }
00177 #ifdef NO_TLS
00178   pthread_setspecific( tls_key, thread );
00179 #else
00180   tls_thread = thread;
00181 #endif
00182   return setcontext( &thread->context_coroutine );
00183 }

00185 
00186 int CTHREAD_yield()
00187 {
00188 
00189   CTHREAD *thread;
00190   
00191 #ifdef NO_TLS  
00192   thread = pthread_getspecific( tls_key );
00193 #else
00194   thread = tls_thread;
00195 #endif
00196 
00197   if (!thread) {
00198     return -1;
00199   }
00200 
00201   if (thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING) {
00202     return -1;
00203   }
00204 
00205   getcontext( &thread->context_coroutine );
00206   if (thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING) {
00207     // got here when this thread was resumed.
00208     thread->state = CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING;
00209     return 0;
00210   }
00211   
00212 #ifdef NO_TLS  
00213   pthread_setspecific( tls_key, thread->prev_thread );
00214 #else
00215   tls_thread = thread->prev_thread;
00216 #endif
00217   return setcontext( &thread->context_caller );
00218 }
00219 
00220 
00221 int CTHREAD_free( CTHREAD *thread )
00222 {
00223   if (thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_EXIT) {
00224     return -1;
00225   }
00226   free(thread);
00227   return 0;
00228 }

00230 int CTHREAD_set_return_value(void *rvalue)
00231 {
00232   CTHREAD *thread;
00233   
00234 #ifdef NO_TLS  
00235   thread = (CTHREAD *) pthread_getspecific( tls_key );
00236 #else
00237   thread = tls_thread;
00238 #endif
00239 
00240 
00241   if (!thread) {
00242     return -1;
00243   }
00244   if (thread->state != CTHREAD_STATE_RUNNING) {
00245     return -1;
00246   }
00247   thread->rvalue = rvalue;
00248   return 0;
00249 }
00250 
00251 uint32_t CTHREAD_get_tid()
00252 {
00253   CTHREAD *thread;
00254   
00255 #ifdef NO_TLS  
00256   thread = (CTHREAD *) pthread_getspecific( tls_key );
00257 #else
00258   thread = tls_thread;
00259 #endif
00260 
00261   if (!thread) {
00262     return (uint32_t) -1;
00263   }
00264   return thread->thread_id;
00265 }
00266 
00267 int CTHREAD_get_return_value( CTHREAD *thread, void **rvalue) 
00268 {
00269   if (thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_SUSPENDED || thread->state == CTHREAD_STATE_EXIT) {
00270     *rvalue = thread->rvalue;
00271     return 0;
00272   }
00273   return -1;
00274 }
